name: CorePower Magnetics
tagline: Revolutionizing Magnetics, Empowering the Future
summary:
CorePower Magnetics, based in Pennsylvania, is a company focused on redefining magnetic solutions for electric vehicles (EVs) and grid applications through advanced materials, manufacturing techniques, and component design.

They aim to reduce size, weight, and improve efficiency in power electronics systems.

The company specializes in inductors, transformers, and motors/generators, offering custom-engineered magnetic cores that result in significant benefits such as up to 10x weight reduction, 5x volume reduction, 50% reduction in losses, and no rare earth metals required.

These advancements lead to higher current capabilities, increased electric vehicle ranges, and longer component lifetimes.

CorePower Magnetics leverages patented combinations of advanced manufacturing processes and novel materials to achieve these improvements.

Their technology is based on soft magnetics technologies developed at Carnegie Mellon University and the National Energy Technology Laboratory, resulting in power electronics components that operate with increased temperature stability in smaller, lighter packages.

The company's founding team comprises developers of the underlying technology and individuals with expertise in soft magnetics, manufacturing, and commercializing energy technologies.

CorePower Magnetics emphasizes collaborative partnerships with clients to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions for inductors, transformers, and motors.
description: CorePower Magnetics focuses on advancing magnetic solutions for electric vehicles and the energy grid within the power electronics industry. The company specializes in the development and manufacturing of inductors, transformers, and motors that are designed to reduce size and weight while improving efficiency. CorePower Magnetics' products are primarily utilized in the electrification of transportation and grid modernization sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
concepts: ['Specializes in advanced magnetic solutions for EVs and grid applications', 'Offers custom-engineered magnetic cores for inductors, transformers, and motors', 'Achieves significant reductions in weight, volume, and losses without rare earth metals']

name: Onit
tagline: Revolutionizing Legal Workflows, Unleashing Business Potential
summary:
Onit is a Texas-based company that specializes in providing legal workflow software and solutions, focusing on process automation for enterprises.

Their product portfolio includes OnitX Enterprise Legal Management (ELM), OnitX Matter Management, OnitX Legal Holds Management, OnitX Legal Spend Management, OnitX Smart Invoice Review, and BusyLamp eBilling.Space.

They also offer OnitX Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM), OnitX Legal Service Management, OnitX Workflow Engine, and various artificial intelligence products such as Onit Catalyst for ELM, Rate Benchmarking, Firm Report Cards, and Comparative Analytics.

Onit's solutions aim to transform legal departments into business drivers by improving operational efficiency, cost management, and revenue generation.

Their comprehensive ELM system centralizes all legal matters and spend data, providing transparency, connectivity, and intelligence for streamlined workflows.

Additionally, their contract management solutions are tailored to meet the specific needs of enterprises, automating and analyzing legal processes to save time and enhance productivity.

Onit also offers legal workflow software to simplify complex processes and facilitate collaboration across departments.

In a recent development, Onit announced the launch of a Generative AI-Powered Virtual Legal Operations Assistant for in-house counsel, further emphasizing their commitment to modernizing legal workflows and enhancing the role of legal departments within organizations.
description: Onit is a company that specializes in enterprise software and artificial intelligence platforms, primarily serving the legal, compliance, sales, IT, HR, and finance sectors. The company offers a range of products that transform best practices into smarter workflows, better processes, and operational efficiencies, with a focus on enterprise legal management, matter management, legal spend management, contract lifecycle management, and legal holds. Onit primarily sells to the legal operations industry, providing solutions that bridge the gap between systems of record and systems of engagement. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Houston, Texas.
concepts: ['Onit offers a comprehensive portfolio of legal workflow solutions, including ELM, matter management, legal spend management, and contract lifecycle management.', 'Their products are designed to automate and streamline legal processes, saving time and improving operational efficiency.', "Onit's artificial intelligence solutions empower legal departments to make data-driven decisions and enhance collaboration across the enterprise."]

name: Doceree
tagline: Elevating Pharma Connection, One HCP at a Time
summary:
Doceree is a pharmaceutical advertising and healthcare marketing company based in New Jersey.

They offer unprecedented solutions for Health Care Professional (HCP) programmatic marketing through their proprietary technology, ESPYIANTM.

This technology allows for hyper-targeting and script lift measurement, enabling brands to reach HCPs efficiently and effectively online.

Doceree's platform includes features such as Doceree TargetTM for creating specific audience segments, Doceree ExchangeTM for buying ad inventory, and Doceree TriggersTM for trigger-based campaigns targeting precise moments of care delivery.

The company's identity-resolution proprietary technology, ESPYIANTM, integrates with the live NPI database of registered HCPs in the United States, allowing for precise targeting based on over 150 data points.

Doceree's platform also includes a Demand-side Platform (DSP), Supply-side Platform (SSP), Ad Server, Data Management Platform (DMP), and real-time performance dashboard for optimizing digital communication efforts.

Doceree operates in the healthcare marketing and pharmaceutical advertising markets, providing services to life science brands looking to engage with HCPs.

They have partnerships with healthcare media agencies and independent healthcare advertising agencies, receiving positive feedback for their real-time data analytics platform and campaign activation speed.
description: Doceree specializes in programmatic marketing within the pharmaceutical advertising and healthcare marketing sectors. Its main offerings include a suite of digital tools for targeting and engaging healthcare professionals (HCPs) through physician-only platforms, powered by its proprietary identity-resolution technology, ESPYIAN. Doceree provides a full tech stack for programmatic marketing, including a demand-side platform (DSP), supply-side platform (SSP), ad server, and data management platform (DMP), along with real-time analytics for campaign optimization. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Parsippany, New Jersey.
concepts: ['Proprietary technology for precise HCP targeting', 'Comprehensive platform for programmatic marketing', 'Real-time performance dashboard for optimization', 'Positive feedback from healthcare media agencies and advertising partners']

name: Stord
tagline: Revolutionizing Your Supply Chain, One Step at a Time
summary:
Stord is a company based in Georgia that specializes in providing port-to-porch logistics solutions integrated with software to help businesses enhance their supply chain operations.

Their Cloud Supply Chain solution offers a comprehensive suite of services including physical logistics, transportation services, and user-friendly OMS and WMS software.

By partnering with Stord, businesses can optimize their supply chain to drive revenue, reduce costs, and improve customer satisfaction.

Stord's logistics capabilities cover a wide range of services such as fulfillment for direct-to-consumer (DTC) and business-to-business (B2B) operations, omnichannel support, transportation services including parcel, drayage, and FTL/LTL options, as well as retail delivery consolidation.

Their Stord One Software integrates features like OMS, order routing, inventory management, last-mile optimization, and consumer experience enhancements.

The company caters to various industries including health & beauty, nutrition & supplements, and apparel & accessories, offering customized solutions tailored to each client's specific needs.

Stord has a track record of helping companies transform their supply chains into a competitive advantage, with featured customers like Athletic Greens and Bow Wow Labs.

Stord also provides resources through their blog, newsroom, resource hub, and podcast, offering insights, case studies, and industry updates.

The company is committed to making supply chains more efficient and effective for brands of all sizes.
description: Stord specializes in omnichannel fulfillment services and supply chain technology, operating within the logistics and supply chain management industry. The company offers a suite of services including fulfillment, warehousing, and transportation, as well as integrated software solutions like an Order Management System (OMS) and Warehouse Management System (WMS) to optimize supply chain operations. Stord's solutions are tailored to meet the specific needs of mid-market and enterprise brands, aiming to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and improve customer experiences. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Union City, Georgia.

name: PharmEasy
tagline: Your One-Stop Health and Wellness Haven
summary:
PharmEasy is an online pharmacy and medical store based in Maharashtra, India, serving over 50 lakhs customers.

The company offers a wide range of products and services including medicines, lab tests, healthcare devices, elderly care products, personal care items, health food and drinks, skin care products, mother and baby care essentials, fitness supplements, ayurvedic care, sexual wellness products, diabetic care items, and more.

PharmEasy's product categories cover a diverse range of health and wellness needs, including bone, joint, and muscle care, men's and women's care, oral care, hair care, face care, body care, glucometers, blood pressure monitors, oximeters, thermometers, COVID kits, nebulizers, spirometers, stethoscopes, trimmers, vaporizers, weighing scales, nutritional drinks, weight management products, baby food, pregnancy nutrition, skin creams, hair removal products, baby hygiene items, personal safety wearables, pain relief accessories, mobility and support accessories, immunity boosters, multivitamins, protein supplements, omega and fish oil supplements, ayurvedic medicines, and more.
description: PharmEasy operates as an online pharmacy and healthcare platform that delivers prescription medicines and healthcare products. It offers a range of services including diagnostic test bookings and delivery of over-the-counter products and medical equipment. It serves a diverse customer base, providing healthcare solutions that emphasize accessibility and affordability. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mumbai, India.
concepts: ['Online pharmacy and medical store serving over 50 lakhs customers', 'Offers a wide range of healthcare products and services', 'Express delivery available to select pincodes', 'Diverse product categories catering to various health and wellness needs']

name: FullStory
tagline: Uncover the Full Story of Your Digital Experience
summary:
FullStory is a company based in Georgia that specializes in providing Digital Experience Intelligence (DXI) solutions.

Their products and services include:

1. Complete Data Capture: FullStory offers secure access to DX data with a simple code snippet, ensuring complete and retroactive user experience insights.

Their autocapture technology is tagless and private by default.

2. Product Analytics: Quantify user experiences for ongoing improvement with features like frustration signals, funnels, conversions, journey mapping, dashboards, and user segments.

3. Session Insights: Gain qualitative context to understand digital experiences through session replay and heatmaps.

4. FullStory for Mobile Apps: Tailored solutions for optimizing user experiences on mobile platforms.

FullStory helps businesses monitor their digital experiences, identify issues and opportunities for improvement, and prioritize changes to enhance user satisfaction and drive conversions.

Their autocapture technology fills in gaps in data, providing valuable insights that would have otherwise been missed.

The company prioritizes privacy and security, offering private-by-default settings and automatic detection of personally identifiable information (PII) to ensure data protection.

FullStory's solutions have been trusted by brands like Lowe's to save millions by optimizing their digital experiences.

FullStory also offers integrations with various data tools through an open API, allowing seamless communication with existing tech stacks.
description: FullStory operates as a behavioral data analytics company. It specializes in understanding user sentiment and interactions within digital environments. The company offers a platform that captures, analyzes, and visualizes user behavior to help businesses improve their digital products and customer experiences. FullStory primarily serves sectors that require deep insights into user behavior, such as e-commerce, finance, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) industries. FullStory was formerly known as Monetology. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Teikametrics
tagline: Unleash Your E-commerce Superpowers
summary:
Teikametrics is a Massachusetts-based company specializing in Amazon and Walmart Marketplace optimization services.

Their flagship product, Teikametrics MAXIMIZING YOUR ECOMMERCE POTENTIAL, is an AI-powered advertising technology designed to ignite growth on Amazon.

The platform offers features such as ad optimization, goal-based campaign creation, algorithmic keyword bidding, and automated keyword actions.

Teikametrics also provides inventory optimization and ad management services to help sellers and brand owners save time and accelerate their growth through data-driven strategies.

The company's focus on maximizing the potential of sellers and brand owners is evident in their premium ad management and agency services.

By leveraging data, AI, and marketplace expertise, Teikametrics aims to help businesses thrive in the competitive e-commerce landscape.

Their Flywheel 2 software connects products, ads, and marketplaces to analyze data hourly and optimize performance intelligently, taking the guesswork out of selling.

Teikametrics is trusted by leading brands such as Swanson, Nutribullet, and Clarks to optimize their marketplace presence and advertising strategies.

Testimonials from satisfied customers highlight the company's ability to drive sales growth, improve return on ad spend, and provide clear insights for brand development on platforms like Amazon.
description: Teikametrics is a company specializing in AI-powered marketplace optimization for the ecommerce sector. It offers a suite of services that include advertising management, inventory forecasting, and multichannel feed optimization, all designed to enhance online retail performance. The company primarily serves businesses operating on large ecommerce platforms such as Amazon and Walmart. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Apify
tagline: Unleash the Web's Potential: Scrape, Automate, and Extract with Ease
summary:
Apify is a company based in Hlavni mesto Praha that offers a full-stack web scraping and data extraction platform.

Their platform allows developers to build, deploy, and publish web scraping, data extraction, and web automation tools.

Apify simplifies the challenges of web scraping by providing open-source tools like Crawlee for building reliable scrapers in Node.js and supporting popular libraries such as Scrapy, Selenium, Playwright, and Puppeteer for Python and JavaScript.

Developers can easily deploy their code to Apify as serverless microapps called Actors, which come with ready-to-use infrastructure, proxies, and storage.

These Actors can be run, scheduled, and monitored through various methods like the Apify Console, CLI, API, or scheduling features.

Apify also provides a large pool of datacenter and residential proxies for smart IP address rotation to prevent blocking.

Users can store and share crawling results using distributed queues of URLs, structured data, or binary files, and export datasets in various formats like CSV, JSON, and Excel.

Apify allows monitoring of performance over time, inspection of Actor runs, logs, and runtime costs, as well as setting up custom automated alerts.

The company offers various pre-built Actors for web scraping tasks, such as the Google Maps Scraper, Web Scraper, Amazon Product Scraper, Cheerio Scraper, and Twitter Scraper.

These Actors cater to different needs like extracting data from Google Maps locations, crawling arbitrary websites, scraping Amazon product information, parsing HTML with Cheerio, and scraping tweets from Twitter profiles.
description: Apify serves as a full-stack web scraping and data extraction platform that operates in the cloud computing industry. The company provides tools for developers to build, deploy, and publish web scraping, data extraction, and web automation solutions. Apify's platform offers a range of services including serverless microapps called Actors, proxy management, and data storage solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Prague, Czech Republic.
concepts: ['Full-stack web scraping and data extraction platform', 'Simplified web scraping with open-source tools and popular libraries', 'Easy deployment of code to Apify as serverless microapps (Actors)', 'Large pool of proxies and smart IP address rotation for preventing blocking', 'Monitoring performance, storing and sharing crawling results, and setting up custom alerts']

name: Route
tagline: Delivering Peace of Mind, One Greener Route at a Time
summary:
Route is a company based in Utah that offers a comprehensive platform for tracking packages and ensuring safe delivery.

Customers can sign in to track all their packages in one place, receive notifications at every step of the delivery process, and guarantee protection against loss, theft, or damage.

Route also provides a merchant portal for businesses to manage orders efficiently.

Additionally, the company promotes sustainability through its "Greener Route" initiative, where orders contribute to reforestation and carbon removal projects.

Customers can opt for carbon neutral shipping at checkout to support environmental causes.

Route's tracking system is described as best-in-class, providing users with a map that offers real-time updates on package locations.

The company also offers theft and damage protection, allowing customers to resolve shipping issues with ease.

Furthermore, Route provides personalized product recommendations and showcases brands that align with causes important to the customer.
description: Route operates as a company to focuses on the electronic commerce experience, specifically in the post-purchase domain. The company offers a suite of tools including visual tracking, one-click package protection, and tailored brand discovery, to help in the customer's experience after making a purchase. It primarily serves the electronic commerce industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Lehi, Utah.
concepts: ['Comprehensive package tracking and delivery protection services', 'Commitment to sustainability through the "Greener Route" initiative', 'Personalized product recommendations and brand alignment with customer values']

name: Tonal
tagline: Unleash Your Strength, Reinvent Your Workout
summary:
Tonal is a California-based company that offers the world's smartest home gym machine for strength and fitness.

Their product, a certified refurbished item, is designed to provide tailored strength training to help individuals achieve their specific fitness goals.

Tonal's technology tracks performance metrics in real-time, creating a customized roadmap for users to reach their targets.

The home gym machine features up to 200 pounds of adaptive weight resistance, adjustable arms for versatile workouts, and smart accessories to enhance the overall exercise experience.

Tonal has received praise for its versatility, with reviewers highlighting its ability to provide a comprehensive workout without the need for additional equipment like dumbbells or yoga mats.

The company has announced a retail expansion partnership with Best Buy to make its product more accessible to a wider audience.

Tonal offers professional installation, a 30-day home trial, and a 2-year limited warranty to ensure customer satisfaction.
description: Tonal is a company that specializes in smart home fitness equipment, revolutionizing the strength training and personal fitness industry. The company offers an all-in-one home gym system that uses machine learning and digital weight resistance to provide personalized workout programs and track performance metrics. Tonal's products are designed to cater to individuals seeking a comprehensive, tailored strength training experience at home. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.
concepts: ['Tonal offers a smart home gym machine for personalized strength training.', 'The product features adaptive weight resistance and versatile workout options.', 'Tonal has received positive reviews for its effectiveness and convenience.', 'The company provides professional installation, a home trial, and a warranty for customer satisfaction.']

name: Smalt
tagline: Powering a Greener Future, One Skill at a Time
summary:
**Smalt Company Summary:**

Smalt is a company based in Berlin with a mission to increase talent supply and productivity in the climate trades.

They aim to be the labor supply and productivity engine driving the global energy transition by combining education, technology, and operational excellence.

The company focuses on training and deploying skilled teams to install clean energy assets, such as solar systems, in homes across Europe.

Additionally, Smalt offers a Trade Services Platform that includes talent, training, and technology to accelerate installation shops.

Their vision for the next 10 years includes educating over 300,000 individuals for climate jobs and installing 6 million additional climate products by 2033. The leadership team at Smalt consists of seasoned global business leaders with a deep passion for developing the next generation of leaders, including co-founders Khurram Masood and Marius Westhoff.
description: Smalt is a talent development and services platform focused on the green trades sector. The company offers specialized training and certification programs in clean energy, along with smart dispatching, AI-driven workflow guidance, and customer analytics to transform service fulfillment. Smalt primarily serves large B2B customers in the clean energy industry, including solar and heat pump OEMs, energy companies, and green energy asset retailers. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
concepts: ['Mission to increase talent supply and productivity in the climate trades', 'Focus on training and deploying skilled teams for clean energy asset installations', 'Offering a Trade Services Platform for partners to accelerate installation shops', 'Vision to educate over 300,000 individuals for climate jobs and install 6 million climate products by 2033']

name: Devoted Health
tagline: Devoted to Your Health, Committed to Your Life
summary:
Devoted Health is a company based in Massachusetts that offers Medicare Advantage plans with a focus on providing comprehensive benefits, savings, and support to its members.

Their plans include various benefits such as coverage for dental services including dentures, crowns, and root canals, over-the-counter items like vitamins and toothpaste, vision exams with allowances for eyeglasses or contacts, prescription drugs starting at $0, fitness benefits for gym equipment and fitness trackers, and hearing exams with low copays for hearing aids.

The company emphasizes the importance of helping individuals live the life they want by offering a range of services and support.

Devoted Health also provides access to a dedicated service team based in the USA to assist members in maximizing their benefits and savings.

They highlight success stories of members who have benefited from their plans, showcasing how Devoted Health has positively impacted their lives.

Devoted Health operates in the healthcare and insurance industries, specifically focusing on Medicare Advantage plans and services for older adults.

They aim to provide reliable and comprehensive Medicare coverage that members can count on, with a strong emphasis on customer service and support.
description: Devoted Health is a healthcare company specializing in Medicare Advantage plans. The company offers a range of services including dental, vision, and prescription drug coverage, as well as fitness and wellness programs, primarily to older Americans. Devoted Health's Medicare Advantage plans are designed to provide comprehensive benefits and savings to its members. Devoted Health was formerly known as Orinoco Health. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Rapyd
tagline: Unleashing Global Payments, Simplified & Seamless
summary:
Rapyd is a global fintech company based in England that offers a wide range of payment processing solutions for businesses operating in various industries.

Their products and services include card acquiring, cross-border payments, multi-currency treasury services, embedded fintech solutions, and more.

Rapyd caters to industries such as B2B payments, online gaming, eCommerce, financial services, marketplaces, online learning, trading platforms, payroll, logistics and distributors, gig economy, small business solutions, restaurants, retail, travel, and leisure.

The company provides a comprehensive platform that allows businesses to accept payments online and in-store, support payments in over 190 countries, and offers a variety of payment methods.

Rapyd's offerings also include virtual accounts, payment fraud protection, physical and virtual card issuing, digital wallets, and global mass payouts.

They have developed payment plugins for popular platforms like Ecwid, Magento, PrestaShop, Shopify, Wix, and WooCommerce.

Rapyd has received recognition as a market leader in the fintech-as-a-service sector and has been listed among the top financial technology companies.

They are known for their expertise in simplifying global payments, reducing transaction fees, and enabling faster expansion into new markets.

The company's focus is on providing businesses with a seamless payment infrastructure so they can concentrate on growing their operations.
description: Rapyd is a fintech company specializing in global payment processing and financial technology solutions. The company offers a platform for businesses to accept payments online, send payouts, and manage multi-currency accounts, with a focus on simplifying financial transactions across borders. Rapyd's services cater to various sectors including eCommerce, marketplaces, and the gig economy. Rapyd was formerly known as CashDash. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Patreon
tagline: Unleash Your Creativity, Build Your Community
summary:
Patreon is a company based in California that provides a platform for creators to connect with their communities and monetize their content directly.

Creators such as podcasters, video creators, musicians, artists, and game developers use Patreon to share exclusive work, engage with their fans, and turn their passion into a sustainable creative business.

The platform offers features like real-time group chats, comments, direct messaging, and email communication to foster deeper connections between creators and their supporters.

Patreon enables creators to have complete creative control, allowing them to share a variety of content including videos, podcasts, writing, art, music, recipes, and more with their most dedicated fans.

The platform emphasizes building real community and turning creative passions into viable businesses by offering revenue streams such as memberships for ongoing benefits and online shops for selling individual content pieces.

Additionally, Patreon provides creators with tools for professional growth, including detailed analytics about their fan base, relationship management tools, and access to a supportive creator community.

The company aims to help creators unlock growth opportunities and establish a sustainable business model outside of traditional ad-based platforms.
description: Patreon develops a platform focused on providing a space for creators to build memberships and connect with their communities. It offers services that allow creators to share their work, such as videos, podcasts, writing, art, music, and more, and to monetize these offerings through memberships and digital product sales. It primarily serves creators in sectors such as podcasting, video creation, music, art, and game development. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.
concepts: ['Patreon provides a platform for creators to connect directly with their communities and monetize their content.', 'Creators on Patreon have complete creative control over the content they share, fostering deeper connections with their fans.', 'The platform offers revenue streams such as memberships and online shops for creators to build sustainable businesses.', 'Patreon provides tools for professional growth, including analytics, relationship management tools, and access to a supportive creator community.']

name: Sendcloud
tagline: Ship Smarter, Deliver Delight
summary:
Sendcloud is a company based in Noord-Brabant that offers shipping software solutions for ecommerce businesses.

Their products and services include shipping automation, returns management, checkout optimization, shipping protection, branded tracking experiences, efficient order processing with Pack & Go feature, API integration for full shipping functionality, and integration with over 50 carriers.

They also offer Tracey, a shipping intelligence tool that automates label creation, tracking emails, returns processing, and more.

Sendcloud aims to help businesses streamline their shipping processes, improve customer experience, reduce cart abandonment, and increase conversion rates.

They provide tools for automating label creation, tracking notifications, and returns management, as well as offering a wide range of carrier options for shipping globally.

The company emphasizes the importance of providing convenient delivery options to customers and ensuring a seamless shipping experience from checkout to returns.
description: SendCloud is a company that focuses on providing shipping software solutions in the ecommerce industry. The company offers a range of services including shipping automation, returns management, checkout optimization, tracking, and packing solutions, all aimed at streamlining and enhancing the shipping process for businesses. It primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Eindhoven, Netherlands.

name: Truepic
tagline: Unveiling the Truth in Your Digital World
summary:
Truepic is a California-based company that specializes in providing secure content transparency solutions through a range of innovative products and services.

Their offerings cater to various commercial markets, enabling organizations to authenticate digital content, enhance transparency, and combat online misinformation.



Truepic's product lineup includes:
1. Truepic Vision: A virtual inspection platform designed to facilitate requesting and reviewing authenticated photos and videos.
2. Truepic Lens: Allows for the authentication of digital content at scale by integrating Truepic's technology into applications.
3. Truepic Sign: Enables the seamless implementation of signed digital media supported by Truepic's visual media PKI.
4. Truepic Display: Provides content transparency across domains through a simple JavaScript library.
5. Ethical Research: Collaborates with MIT Media Lab researchers to add provenance to synthetic media in academic research.
6. Transparency in AI: Partners with Revel.ai and Nina Schick to produce transparent deepfake videos.
7. Truepic Blog: Offers insights, company news, and research updates.
8. Trusted Future: A newsletter focused on Digital Content Authenticity news, trends, and issues.

Truepic's technology focuses on enhancing authenticity infrastructure for the internet by recording and displaying critical details of digital content creation and editing.

Their secure camera technology captures essential information such as date, time, location, and true pixels, ensuring transparency and shared trust in online content.

Truepic's solutions are designed to increase transparency at scale and enable secure authentication of digital content, making it easier for consumers to verify the origin and history of media files.
description: TruePic specializes in digital content authenticity infrastructure within the technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools for securely capturing, signing, and verifying the authenticity and editing history of digital media, including photos, videos, and audio. TruePic primarily serves sectors that require content verification and transparency, such as media publishers, content creators, and digital platforms. It was founded in 2015 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: CircleCI
tagline: Unleash Your Code's Potential, Accelerate Your AI Future
summary:
CircleCI is a California-based company that offers a comprehensive Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) platform for the AI future.

Their platform allows users to deploy models with CircleCI and Amazon SageMaker, enabling fast and efficient building processes.

CircleCI prides itself on industry-leading speed, providing a foundation for delivery at scale, instilling confidence in every commit, and empowering users to create without limits.

The company emphasizes performance, scalability, and flexibility in their CI/CD solutions, ensuring that pipelines accelerate business growth rather than hinder it.

CircleCI's platform supports code in every language and across multiple execution environments, offering thousands of pre-built integrations and flexible environments.

They also provide seamless integration with popular services like AWS, Slack, and Atlassian, as well as version control platforms such as GitLab, GitHub, and Bitbucket.

CircleCI is known for its security features, including FedRAMP certification and SOC 2 Type II compliance, as well as premium support from DevOps professionals.

The company has garnered praise from leading organizations for its efficiency, simplicity, and cost-effectiveness in deploying code with confidence.

CircleCI's focus on AI projects is evident through their resources and guides on AI adoption, CI for machine learning, and automating ML workflows.

They offer a free tier with 6,000 build minutes to help users get started, along with additional features such as expanded support for AI-enabled applications and improved monitoring capabilities.
description: CircleCI is a company focused on providing continuous integration and delivery solutions within the software development industry. Their platform enables engineering teams to build, test, and deploy code with confidence, offering features such as automated testing, pipeline automation, and progressive delivery. CircleCI's services cater to a wide range of applications, including mobile, web, AI, and cloud-based solutions. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.
concepts: ['Industry-leading speed and performance in CI/CD solutions', 'Scalable and flexible platform supporting diverse languages and environments', 'Emphasis on security, compliance, and premium support services', 'Specialized focus on AI projects with resources and guides available']
keywords: ['Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)', 'DevOps', 'Software Development', 'Cloud Computing', 'Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning']

name: WayCool
tagline: Feeding Innovation, Nurturing Growth
summary:
WayCool is India's largest food and agritech company based in Tamil Nadu.

They operate in multiple commercial markets and offer a wide range of products and services:

1. Supply of Branded Staples, Fresh Produce, and Dairy Products: WayCool supplies a variety of branded grains, staples, nuts, spices, fresh fruits, vegetables, and dairy products sourced from their network of farmers and primary processors.

These products are distributed to retailers and institutional clients across Southern India and the Middle East.

2. Private Label Packaging: The company offers private label packaging services for staples, grains, nuts, and spices for consumer-packaged goods manufacturers, retailers, and online platforms in Southern India and the Middle East.

3. Logistics and Distribution Solutions: WayCool provides warehousing, picking, packing, distributorship, and last-mile delivery solutions for FMCG companies, e-commerce platforms, retail chains, and HoReCa clients in Southern India.

4. Supply Chain Tech Solution: Through their technology subsidiary CENSA, WayCool offers integrated technology solutions for distribution management, warehouse automation, quality management, farmer engagement, and enterprise platform implementation for clients in the food and agri space worldwide.

5. End-to-End Farming Solutions: WayCool equips farmers with data, agricultural practices, resources, and technology for higher yield and returns.

6. Most Advanced Retail Tech: Their AI-driven procurement and planning engine ensures high demand prediction accuracy, leading to a 98% fill-rate and 92% customer retention rate.

WayCool's seamless supply chain model, powered by a robust AI-based demand forecasting system, reduces food losses to less than 2% and ensures efficient matching of supply to demand.
description: WayCool is a food and agritech company, focusing on the development and distribution of food products across various sectors. The company operates a supply chain from soil to sale, offering a broadline product range that includes fresh produce, staples, and dairy products. WayCool serves clientele including general trade, modern trade, and food services space. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: Wiz
tagline: Your Cloud, Secured and Simplified
summary:
Wiz is a company based in New York that offers the Wiz Cloud Security Platform, designed to secure everything built and run in the cloud.

Trusted by over 40% of Fortune 100 companies, Wiz is rated #1 in cloud security by customers.

The platform provides a unified solution for cloud security and development teams, offering prevention, active detection, and response capabilities.

Wiz's services include Continuous Data Monitoring, Cloud Entitlement Analysis, Cloud Workload Monitoring, Infrastructure as Code (IaC) Scanning, Container & Kubernetes Security, Vulnerability Management, Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM), Compliance Assurance, and Workload Protection.

Wiz's platform enables users to reduce risk, gain visibility, prioritize accurately, and enhance business agility.

By integrating Wiz into development workflows, organizations can securely manage infrastructure as code, detect vulnerabilities, and ensure compliance with industry standards.

The company's comprehensive approach covers various cloud environments, scans every layer, and addresses all aspects of cloud security without the need for installing agents.
description: Wiz provides cloud security software within the cybersecurity industry. Its main offerings include a unified cloud security platform that enables security, development, and operations teams to collaborate and secure cloud environments effectively. Wiz's platform offers solutions for continuous security posture management (CSPM), container and Kubernetes security, cloud workload protection (CWPP), identity and access management (CIEM), and data security posture management (DSPM), among others. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
concepts: ['Trusted by over 40% of Fortune 100 companies', 'Rated #1 in cloud security by customers', 'Offers a unified cloud security platform for prevention, detection, and response']

name: Shipwell
tagline: Transforming Logistics, Driving Efficiency
summary:
Shipwell is a Texas-based company that is revolutionizing transportation management systems and logistics solutions.

They offer a comprehensive suite of products and services aimed at optimizing supply chain operations for businesses of all sizes and complexities.

Shipwell's offerings include a Transportation Management System (TMS) that allows users to plan, execute, track shipments, analyze performance, and manage settlements seamlessly.

Their visibility feature enables real-time tracking and communication with carriers and customers, while the integrated network centralizes business processes through various integrations.

In addition to their core TMS product, Shipwell provides managed shipping solutions such as Capacity as a Service and Strategic Supply Chain Management (4PL).

These solutions leverage Shipwell's technology platform and dedicated team to help companies increase carrier capacity, reduce operating costs, and deliver excellence to customers.

Shipwell has also partnered with industry leaders like DAT Freight & Analytics to provide real-time dynamic ratings and market rate intelligence within their TMS screens.

The company is at the forefront of innovation, being the first TMS to harness the power of ChatGPT for AI-driven transportation management systems.

Shipwell's focus on automation, analytics, and real-time tracking helps businesses save time and money while increasing efficiency across their entire supply chain.
description: Shipwell specializes in supply chain efficiency and service solutions for logistics. The company offers a comprehensive platform that combines transportation management, visibility, and procurement capabilities, enabling shippers to operate, manage, and optimize the shipping process seamlessly. Shipwell primarily serves the logistics and supply chain sectors of the economy. It was formerly known as OtterLogic. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Field Effect Software
tagline: Cybersecurity Confidence, Tailored for Your Business
summary:
Field Effect Software, based in Ontario, specializes in providing powerful cybersecurity solutions tailored for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs).

Their comprehensive range of products and services includes managed cybersecurity, cybersecurity compliance, incident response planning, phishing simulation exercises, malware and ransomware protection, and simulation-based security training.

Field Effect Software aims to offer end-to-end defense solutions that maximize security, minimize complexity, and provide true peace of mind for businesses of all sizes.

Their Incident Response team is equipped to handle breaches with hands-free managed detection and response services.

The Covalence platform offers protection for endpoints, networks, and cloud services from a single platform.

Additionally, the company provides simulation-based security training to enhance cybersecurity team expertise through authentic virtual environments.

Field Effect Software is trusted by businesses big and small, with testimonials highlighting the company's cybersecurity knowledge, incident handling capabilities, and the value they bring to their clients.

They also offer partnership opportunities for businesses looking to deliver differentiated cybersecurity services that attract customers, improve margins, and accelerate revenue growth.

The company has received acclaim from industry authorities, winning awards such as AI-based cybersecurity solution of the year and being recognized as one of Canada's fastest-growing technology companies.

Field Effect Software boasts a team of world-class cybersecurity experts who have contributed to shaping national cybersecurity strategies.
description: Field Effect is a cybersecurity company that provides comprehensive security solutions and services. The company offers managed detection and response, cybersecurity assessments, incident response services, and training programs to enhance organizational security. Field Effect primarily serves small and mid-size businesses seeking advanced cybersecurity protection and compliance. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ottawa, Ontario.
concepts: ['Comprehensive cybersecurity solutions for SMBs', 'Incident response services and managed detection and response', 'Simulation-based security training for cybersecurity teams', 'Award-winning cybersecurity solutions', 'Team of world-class cybersecurity experts']

name: beehiiv
tagline: Unleash Your Newsletter Potential
summary:
**Company Summary:**

beehiiv is a newsletter platform based in New York, founded by the team behind Morning Brew.

The platform is designed to help users own their audience and drive growth through powerful tools and features tailored for newsletter creation, publishing, audience engagement, and monetization.

With a focus on simplicity and effectiveness, beehiiv offers a comprehensive suite of tools that enable users to create, publish, grow, and monetize newsletters without the need for complex integrations or coding skills.

The platform provides users with advanced editing and design tools for creating visually appealing newsletters, along with features for launching media brands quickly and efficiently.

Users can access world-class newsletters and websites templates to elevate their content creation process.

Additionally, beehiiv offers tools used by some of the largest newsletters in the world, enabling users to scale their operations and reach a wider audience effectively.

Through beehiiv, users can also monetize their newsletters by leveraging the platform's capabilities that simulate having a full sales and revenue team without the need for additional resources.

The platform has been instrumental in helping various newsletters achieve significant growth and success, with testimonials highlighting its power and effectiveness in audience acquisition and revenue generation.
description: Beehiiv is a company that focuses on providing a platform for newsletter creation and growth, operating within the digital communication and media industry. The company offers a comprehensive platform that enables users to create, publish, grow, and monetize their newsletters without the need for coding or complex integrations. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
concepts: ['Developed by the team behind Morning Brew', 'Comprehensive suite of tools for newsletter creation, publishing, growth, and monetization', 'Advanced editing and design features for visually appealing newsletters', 'Enables quick launch of media brands with no-coding required', 'Access to tools used by top newsletters for scaling operations', 'Simulates a full sales and revenue team for monetization', 'Testimonials showcasing successful audience growth and acquisitions']

name: ROKT
tagline: Unlocking Relevance, Boosting Ecommerce Success
summary:
ROKT is a company based in New York that specializes in unlocking relevance in ecommerce.

They offer solutions to help businesses grow revenue on their site, acquire customers at scale, and deepen relationships with existing customers.

ROKT provides various products and services:

1. Rokt Ecommerce: Helps businesses increase revenue from their site by optimizing and monetizing the checkout experience, showing relevant payment providers during checkout, and providing premium offers to enhance customer lifetime value.

2. Rokt Ads: Enables businesses to acquire customers at scale by connecting with customers in the buying mindset on the confirmation pages of select ecommerce websites.

Customers are more likely to engage with ads post-transaction, and businesses only pay for prospective customers who positively engage with their offer.

3. Rokt Calendar: A Calendar Marketing solution that helps businesses grow engagement with their customers through calendar-based marketing strategies.

ROKT is trusted by over 2,500 leading ecommerce brands and advertisers worldwide, driving millions in incremental revenue for their clients.

They have been recognized with awards and certifications such as Inc.

5000, MarTech Breakthrough Award, and Crain’s New York Business Fast 50. The company is known for its customer-obsessed team of explorers, technologists, innovators, dealmakers, and creators.
description: Rokt focuses on electronic commerce technology. The company offers solutions to increase revenue, acquire customers at scale, and form relationships with existing customers. These solutions include optimizing and monetizing the checkout experience, providing payment providers during checkout, and offering premium post-purchase offers. The company operates in the e-commerce sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.
concepts: ['Trusted by over 2,500 leading ecommerce brands and advertisers', 'Award-winning solutions recognized by Inc. 5000 and MarTech Breakthrough', 'Customer-obsessed team focused on unlocking relevance in ecommerce']

name: Away
tagline: Effortless Journeys, Limitless Adventures
summary:
Away is a New York-based company that specializes in modern travel products.

They offer a wide range of suitcases, bags, and accessories designed to make travel easier and more convenient.

Away's product line includes suitcases in various sizes such as carry-ons and checked bags, available in collections like Classic, Flex, and Aluminum.

Their bags category features duffles, backpacks, totes, and crossbodies, catering to different travel needs and preferences.

Additionally, Away offers accessories like packing organizers, toiletry bags, small leather goods, and made-to-fit accessories to enhance the travel experience.

One of Away's unique features is their innovative design that allows bags to attach to suitcases, enabling travelers to roll everything together effortlessly, even with just one hand.

Their suitcases are known for their smooth-gliding wheels, lightweight and durable hard shell, easy-grip handles, and enhanced interior organization, making them a popular choice among frequent travelers.

Away has physical stores in various locations including Austin, Boston, Chicago, London, Los Angeles, New York City, San Francisco, Seattle, Toronto, and Washington DC, in addition to their online presence.

The company prides itself on offering high-quality, functional, and stylish travel products that cater to the needs of modern travelers.
description: Away operates as an electronic commerce platform. The company offers a range of products including suitcases, bags, and travel accessories designed for traveling. Away's primary market is the travel industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.
concepts: ['Innovative design allowing bags to attach to suitcases for easy rolling', 'High-quality suitcases with smooth-gliding wheels and durable construction', 'Wide range of travel products including suitcases, bags, and accessories']

name: Bloomreach
tagline: Unleash Limitless Commerce, Personalized by AI
summary:
Bloomreach is a California-based company specializing in e-commerce personalization powered by AI.

They offer a range of products and services aimed at enhancing customer experiences and maximizing revenue for businesses operating in various industries such as retail, travel & hospitality, beauty, and food & beverage.



Bloomreach's product offerings include:
1. Engagement platform: Personalize marketing in real-time across email, SMS, app, website, and more, including email marketing, SMS & messaging, ads & retargeting, web personalization, mobile app marketing, marketing intelligence & AI, omnichannel orchestration, experiments & A/B testing.
2. Product Discovery: E-commerce search and merchandising focused on maximizing revenue, with features like search intelligence, merchandising, search APIs, product recommendations, SEO, and personalized search.
3. Content/Discovery: Build, manage, and personalize experiences with headless CMS for every commerce platform, including headless content, page building, site management, content personalization, and headless commerce use cases.
4. Data & Integrations: Loomi AI for e-commerce, customer data engine, customer data management, advanced analytics for omnichannel personalization, and various integrations for Bloomreach products.

Bloomreach enables personalized marketing automation, product discovery, content management, and conversational shopping, providing limitless shopping experiences for customers.

They leverage richer data by combining real-time customer and robust product data, and their AI solution, Loomi, is specifically engineered for commerce.

The company focuses on connected orchestration to deliver consistent experiences across the entire customer journey for profitable revenue growth.
description: Bloomreach specializes in e-commerce personalization and marketing automation using artificial intelligence (AI). The company offers a suite of products that enable businesses to personalize customer experiences across various channels, including email, short message service (SMS), applications, and websites, by using real-time data and AI. Bloomreach's solutions cater to sectors such as retail, travel and hospitality, beauty, and food and beverage. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Mountain View, California.
concepts: ['Offers e-commerce personalization powered by AI', 'Provides a comprehensive suite of products for marketing automation, product discovery, content management, and conversational shopping', 'Specializes in maximizing revenue and enhancing customer experiences across various industries']
keywords: ['E-commerce', 'Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning', 'Marketing Automation', 'Customer Experience', 'Content Management Systems']

name: Singular
tagline: Unleashing Growth, One Insight at a Time
summary:
Singular is a California-based company that specializes in marketing analytics and attribution solutions.

They offer a wide range of products and services tailored to help businesses in various commercial markets optimize their marketing strategies and drive growth.

Some of the key products and services offered by Singular include marketing analytics, cost aggregation, partner integrations, mobile attribution, SKAdNetwork attribution, deep linking, cross-device attribution, PC and console attribution, marketing ETL, audience management benchmarks, ad monetization, and creative analytics.

The company operates in industries such as agencies, e-commerce, finance, gaming, kids apps, and Web3. Singular's solutions provide customers with accurate and actionable cross-platform analytics, full-funnel marketing data, and best-in-class fraud prevention.

By leveraging Singular's next-gen attribution platform, teams can access unified marketing data, track conversions across channels, and analyze ad revenue effectively.

The company stands out for its ability to automate data standardization, provide accurate cost and ROI reporting, block ad fraud, and visualize ad performance in a comprehensive manner.

Singular has received positive feedback from customers who appreciate the time-saving benefits and the ability to focus on executing campaigns effectively.

The company's platform has been instrumental in helping businesses uncover ROI across the entire customer journey, optimize marketing strategies, and drive intelligent growth.

Singular's expertise in addressing complex data challenges and unifying marketing data has earned them praise from industry professionals.
description: Singular specializes in marketing analytics and attribution within the marketing technology domain. The company's services include providing cross-platform analytics, cost aggregation, mobile attribution, fraud prevention, and marketing extract, transform, and load (ETL) to unify and analyze marketing data. Its solutions cater primarily to industries such as agencies, electronic commerce, finance, gaming, and various application markets. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.
concepts: ['Next-gen attribution platform for accurate cross-platform analytics', 'Comprehensive marketing data unification and visualization', 'Industry-leading fraud prevention solutions', 'Positive customer feedback on time-saving benefits and campaign execution support']
keywords: ['Marketing Analytics', 'Advertising Technology', 'Business Intelligence & Analytics', 'Data Integration', 'Fraud Detection']

name: Synack
tagline: Securing Success, One Test at a Time
summary:
Synack is a premier security testing platform company based in California, offering a range of services to help organizations enhance their cybersecurity posture.

They operate in commercial markets such as managed vulnerability disclosure, application security testing, attack surface management, penetration testing as a service, security testing for third-party risk, cloud security testing, and vulnerability management.



Synack's Penetration Testing as a Service (PTaaS) combines automation tools with human-led security testing for continuous risk reduction.

They provide on-demand security testing that can scale to meet specific objectives.

Synack has achieved the highest designation among peer security companies, particularly in pentesting in a FedRAMP Moderate environment.

The company offers a one-stop-shop approach to managing everything from test planning to communication between the Synack Red Team and developers, remediation tracking, and validation.

Their platform, combined with offerings from an ecosystem of partners, provides a unified offensive security testing approach with defensive security methods to improve security posture and reduce breach risks.

Synack's Red Team comprises over 1,500 skilled security researchers who work with patented technology to deliver best-in-class offensive security testing continuously.

They offer a range of resources, including videos, case studies, articles, and podcasts, to keep customers informed about the latest industry trends and company news.
description: Synack is a company that specializes in security testing within the cybersecurity industry. Its main offerings include Penetration Testing as a Service (PTaaS), which combines automated tools with human-led security testing for continuous risk reduction, and vulnerability management that identifies, assesses, and remediates security weaknesses. Synack's platform also provides on-demand security testing and is recognized for operating in a FedRAMP Moderate environment. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Redwood City, California.
concepts: ['Premier security testing platform offering penetration testing as a service', 'On-demand security testing that scales to meet specific objectives', 'Synack Red Team comprising over 1,500 skilled security researchers', 'Focus on continuous risk reduction and improving security posture', 'Strategic security testing approach with a one-stop-shop solution']

name: Cockroach Labs
tagline: Unleash the Power of Unstoppable Data
summary:
Cockroach Labs is a company based in New York that specializes in building CockroachDB, a cloud-native, distributed SQL database designed for high availability, effortless scale, and control over data placement.

CockroachDB is trusted by industry leaders to run critical mainframe workloads and mission-critical applications.

The database is known for its ability to scale horizontally, eliminating the complexity of manual sharding and supporting distributed, ACID-compliant transactions.

CockroachDB ensures data consistency and availability even during regional outages and database upgrades, allowing for uninterrupted service delivery and revenue generation.

With a multi-active architecture, CockroachDB enables every machine to serve both reads and writes, ensuring high availability and zero RPO/RTO.

The platform also allows for multi-region, multi-cloud deployments, giving users control over data placement and latency to deliver low-latency experiences to customers worldwide.

Cockroach Labs offers Cockroach University, providing world-class training and tutorials for beginners and advanced users, as well as a Docs Hub for access to tutorials, guides, and example applications.

The company operates in the cloud-native, Kubernetes, manufacturing, logistics, and mainframe modernization markets, catering to businesses looking for a reliable, scalable, and efficient database solution.
description: Cockroach Labs focuses on the development of distributed structured query language (SQL) databases. It provides CockroachDB, offering features such as elastic scaling, cloud-native compatibility, built-in survivability, and consistent SQL, primarily serving industries such as finance, gaming, manufacturing and logistics, media and streaming, retail and e-commerce. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Salto
tagline: Unleash Your Configurations, Simplify Your Success
summary:
Salto is a company based in Tel Aviv that offers DevOps solutions for business applications configuration.

Their platform allows users to manage configurations between environments in an automated manner, saving time, reducing errors, and improving efficiency.

Salto caters to various commercial markets, including Salesforce, Salesforce CPQ, Zendesk, NetSuite, Jira Software, Jira Service Management, and Okta, offering integration solutions for these applications.

Salto's products and services include features such as metadata customization for Salesforce, change migration automation for NetSuite, environment alignment for Zendesk, instance comparison for Jira, and configuration change management for Okta.

The platform enables users to gain full visibility into their configurations, deploy changes between environments, automate deployment processes, streamline approvals, and facilitate change planning.

With a focus on collaboration, Salto allows teams to stay on the same page, receive notifications about changes, and utilize AI-powered insights for configuration elements.

The company emphasizes security, being a certified partner of top business applications and adhering to industry standards such as SOC 2 Type II.
description: Salto specializes in DevOps for business applications configuration within the enterprise systems management sector. The company offers solutions for automating the change management process, enabling efficient and streamlined workflows for system operations teams. Salto's services include metadata customization, change migration automation, and environment alignment, as well as version control integration and CI/CD pipeline development for system configurations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
concepts: ['Offers DevOps solutions for business applications configuration', 'Provides automation for configuration management between environments', 'Specializes in integration solutions for Salesforce, NetSuite, Zendesk, Jira, and Okta', 'Emphasizes collaboration, security, and AI-powered insights for configuration elements']
keywords: ['Cloud Computing', 'Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning', 'Enterprise Software', 'Information Technology', 'Security']

name: Auvik Networks
tagline: Master Your Network, Unlock Your Potential
summary:
Auvik Networks, based in Ontario, offers a comprehensive suite of network management solutions tailored for various commercial markets.

Their products and services include:

1. **Network Management**: Auvik provides easy and efficient network management solutions, offering features such as mapping, inventory management, configuration backup, and more.

Users can gain true network visibility and control in under an hour.

2. **SaaS Management**: Auvik helps organizations uncover, monitor, manage, and secure their SaaS ecosystems.

Users can gain an accurate picture of their SaaS ecosystem, visualize SaaS adoption, and manage their SaaS applications effectively.

3. **Wi-Fi Management**: Auvik's Wi-Fi management solutions simplify site visits, reduce network downtime, and enhance the end-user Wi-Fi experience.

Features include automatic Wi-Fi event detection, endpoint discovery, and interference tracking.

Auvik's offerings are optimized for various sectors, and their pricing is transparent and easy to understand.

They also provide training and certification programs to make network management more accessible and profitable for Managed Service Providers (MSPs).
description: Auvik Networks is a company that specializes in network management in the information technology sector. The company offers services such as network mapping, inventory management, configuration backup, performance monitoring, and network traffic analysis. It also provides software as a service (SaaS) management and Wi-Fi management solutions. Auvik Networks primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, financial services, education, healthcare, and government. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Waterloo, Ontario.
concepts: ['Auvik offers network management, SaaS management, and Wi-Fi management solutions.', 'Their products provide total network transparency, automation of admin tasks, and real-time issue identification.', 'Auvik is highly rated by independent reviews and is essential for MSPs looking to improve profitability and efficiency.']
keywords: ['Network Management', 'Software as a Service (SaaS)', 'Information Technology', 'Telecommunications', 'Wireless Networking']

name: Firstvet
tagline: Connecting Paws to Expert Care, Virtually
summary:
Firstvet is a company based in Stockholms Lan that offers online veterinary services.

Their platform allows pet owners to connect with licensed veterinarians through video consultations, providing convenient and accessible healthcare for their pets.

Firstvet's services cover a wide range of issues, including general health concerns, behavioral problems, and emergency situations.

The company's online vet consultations are designed to provide pet owners with professional advice and guidance without the need for in-person visits to a veterinary clinic.

This service is particularly beneficial for pet owners who may have difficulty accessing traditional veterinary care due to location, mobility issues, or scheduling constraints.

Firstvet's team of experienced veterinarians are available to assist pet owners with a variety of healthcare needs, from routine check-ups to urgent medical issues.

The platform also offers features such as the ability to upload photos and videos for the veterinarian to review, as well as access to a library of pet health resources and information.

Overall, Firstvet aims to revolutionize the way pet owners access veterinary care by providing a convenient, reliable, and efficient online platform for pet healthcare needs.
description: FirstVet is a digital veterinary clinic operating in the pet care industry. The company offers on-demand access to advice from licensed veterinarians through video meetings, providing a convenient and accessible way for pet owners to receive professional guidance. It serves the pet care sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.
concepts: ['Offers online veterinary consultations for pet owners', 'Provides access to licensed veterinarians for a wide range of healthcare needs', 'Features include video consultations, photo/video uploads, and pet health resources']

name: Casavo
tagline: Selling Simplified, Effortless Euphoria
summary:
Casavo is a company based in Lombardia that operates in the real estate industry, offering an online platform for home valuation and instant buying services.

Their platform allows users to easily find out the value of their home, explore selling options, and receive offers from interested buyers without the hassle of traditional real estate processes.

Casavo streamlines the selling process by connecting sellers with potential buyers who are genuinely interested, saving time and maximizing the selling price.

The company empowers the real estate industry with data-enabled innovation, providing transparent information on home valuations, market dynamics, and essential documents for selling a house.

Casavo's approach is described as simple, safe, and guided, offering a new way to sell a house by providing a price range, connecting sellers with potential buyers, and guiding them through the sale process.

Casavo's services include valuating homes, buying houses in major Italian cities like Milan, Rome, and Turin, and providing useful resources through their app, guides, and blog.

The company's focus on speed, hassle-free transactions, and efficiency has garnered positive feedback from customers who have experienced euphoria, stress relief, and significant time savings through Casavo's services.
description: Casavo is a company that focuses on providing smart solutions for selling and buying homes in the real estate sector. The company offers services such as instant home valuation based on market data, a digital platform for managing real estate transactions, and additional services like professional photography and virtual tours to enhance property listings. Casavo primarily serves individuals looking to sell or buy homes, leveraging technology to streamline the real estate process. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Milan, Italy.
concepts: ['Casavo offers an online platform for home valuation and instant buying services in the real estate industry.', 'The company streamlines the selling process by connecting sellers with interested buyers and providing transparent information on home valuations and market dynamics.', "Casavo's services are described as simple, safe, and guided, offering a new way to sell a house with a focus on speed, efficiency, and hassle-free transactions."]

name: Matsmart
tagline: Shop Smart, Save More, Waste Less
summary:
Matsmart is a company based in Stockholms Lan that offers a unique online shopping experience for food and household products.

They focus on providing a wide range of products at discounted prices, with a strong emphasis on sustainability and affordability.

Customers can find a variety of items such as pantry staples, beverages, snacks, beauty and skincare products, as well as pet supplies and eco-friendly options.

Matsmart also offers bulk purchasing options for certain categories, allowing customers to save even more on their purchases.

The company operates in various market segments, including food and beverage, health and wellness, household goods, and pet care.

They collaborate with well-known brands like Pepsi, Heinz, Marabou, and Naturdiet to offer a diverse selection of products to their customers.

Matsmart's platform is designed to help reduce food waste by offering products that are close to their expiration date or are surplus stock from suppliers, allowing customers to save money while contributing to environmental sustainability.

Matsmart's product categories include pantry essentials like pasta, rice, and spices, as well as ready-to-eat meals, snacks, and beverages.

They also cater to specific dietary needs with options for gluten-free, vegan, and organic products.

Additionally, Matsmart offers a range of personal care items, household cleaning supplies, and pet food to meet the diverse needs of their customers.
description: Matsmart-Motatos is an e-commerce company focused on sustainable shopping and reducing food waste in the grocery sector. The company offers a wide range of discounted groceries, household items, and personal care products. Matsmart-Motatos primarily serves the online retail market, offering bulk purchasing options and a variety of products to cater to different customer needs. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.
concepts: ['Matsmart offers discounted prices on a wide range of food and household products.', 'The company focuses on sustainability by reducing food waste and offering eco-friendly options.', 'Matsmart collaborates with popular brands to provide customers with quality products at affordable prices.']

name: ShipBob
tagline: Elevate Your Brand, Fulfill Global Success
summary:
ShipBob is a global omnifulfillment solution based in Illinois, providing best-in-class supply chain solutions for thousands of brands to fulfill orders globally.

They offer a range of services, including memorable unboxing experiences, faster shipping, and fulfillment of global orders from the US, UK, EU, Canada, and Australia.

ShipBob's proprietary warehouse management system (WMS) helps improve operations for brands that have their own warehouses.

The company boasts a 99% on-time shipping rate and a 99% accuracy rate in fulfilling orders, operating from over 50 fulfillment centers across 6 countries.

ShipBob's end-to-end fulfillment services help brands optimize inventory placement, improve delivery speeds, and reduce shipping costs.

Their platform allows for easy scaling by distributing inventory across multiple warehouses over time.

With a focus on affordable 2-day shipping, transparent pricing, a wide range of fulfillment services, and performance transparency, ShipBob enables brands to focus on growth while leaving fulfillment in capable hands.

The company's web-based platform acts as a back office for logistics, offering tools to manage, edit, and customize orders, track stock levels, and receive inventory reorder notifications.

ShipBob's technology automates fulfillment processes, provides real-time analytics, and offers expert support for inventory and order management across various channels and locations.

They ensure reliable and fast shipping, with over 95% on-time 2-day shipping coverage in the US, helping brands meet customer expectations and drive loyalty.

ShipBob supports multichannel inventory and order management on platforms like Amazon, Walmart, Facebook, Google, Etsy, and eBay, preventing stockouts, providing real-time stock level visibility, and fulfilling orders from various sales channels.

They also facilitate EDI-automated wholesale and retail workflows, supporting retailers like Ace Hardware, Bed Bath & Beyond, Best Buy, and many more.
description: ShipBob develops a technology-enabled third-party logistics (3PL) offering simple and fast e-commerce fulfillment for direct-to-consumer brands. It helps brands to ship orders to their customer's shops. It also offers order and inventory management, warehouse management, predictive data and analytics, and more. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.
concepts: ['Global omnifulfillment solution trusted by thousands of brands', 'Proprietary warehouse management system for improved operations', 'Focus on affordable 2-day shipping and transparent pricing', 'End-to-end fulfillment services with performance transparency', 'Multichannel inventory and order management support']

name: Brigit
tagline: Bridging Financial Gaps, Building Brighter Futures
summary:
Brigit is a financial services company based in New York, offering a range of products and services to help users manage their finances effectively.

With over 4 million users, Brigit provides cash advances, credit-building opportunities, and tools for smarter saving and budgeting.

Users can sign up in just 2 minutes without the need for a credit check.

The company boasts a high rating on both the App Store and Google Play, indicating customer satisfaction.

Brigit's key offerings include quick approval for cash advances without credit checks or late fees, helping users build their credit scores.

The platform also provides tools for monitoring credit and identity protection, offering up to $1 million in coverage for identity theft.

Users can gain insights into their spending habits, receive alerts for upcoming bills, and access job opportunities and savings within the app.

The company's predictive technology helps users avoid overdrafts by notifying them in advance and providing automatic cash advances to prevent fees.

Real-time updates on bank balances, spending trends, and savings from avoiding fees are also available.

Brigit emphasizes data security, using 256-bit encryption to protect user information and ensuring no sale of personal data to third parties.

Brigit's Credit Builder service helps users improve their credit scores through on-time payments and responsible financial management.

The company's analysis shows positive score changes for customers with starting scores of 600 or below.

Brigit offers a subscription-based model with optional express delivery for cash advances, with fees ranging from $9 to $14 per month.
description: Brigit is a financial services company that offers tools for cash advances, credit building, and financial management. The company provides instant cash advances without credit checks, credit building services without upfront deposits, and financial insights to help users manage their finances. Brigit's products are designed to help individuals avoid overdraft fees, improve their credit scores, and gain better control over their financial health. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.
concepts: ['Over 4 million users benefiting from cash advances, credit-building tools, and financial insights', 'High ratings on the App Store and Google Play, indicating customer satisfaction', 'Focus on data security with 256-bit encryption and no sale of personal information', 'Credit Builder service helping users improve credit scores, particularly for those with scores below 600']
